articles.description: Asymptomatic carriers in Bahrain found to pose a risk; shortage of test kits ‘leading to virus spread in Africa’; Mexico confirms record daily infections

articles.author: Peter Walker, Heather Stewart, Hannah Devlin
articles.title: Uncertainty over 2-metre distancing rule in England 'causing chaos' - The Guardian
articles.description: Millions spent on signage will have been wasted as shops and councils prepare for lockdown easing

articles.author: Nicola Findlay
articles.title: East Kilbride care home at centre of COVID-19 outbreak given Inspectorate's backing - Daily Record
articles.description: Whitehills Care Home has seen 23 COVID-related deaths among residents and was reported to the Care Inspectorate by Monica Lennon MSP.
articles.content:
An under-fire East Kilbride care home where 23 residents have died from coronavirus has been backed by the Care Inspectorate - despite urgent calls for an investigation.
